name: Endless Dungeon (itch)
description:
∞ DungeonMade for the Stencyl Game-Jam.
Instructions
Use your Arrow-Keys or WASD to move the character. Bump into enemies to attack them. Collect gold and exp to level up and improve your character. Descend as far as you can get.
